heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_silencer
heroes.bio_loc:
作为一支精心呵护的传承血脉中第七代也是最后一代的成员，诺崇从小就被一个叫做风蚀之寒的古老组织抚养，为的是让他成为世界上技艺空前的大魔法师。他就是预言中那个天选者，两百年来，先人在配偶和繁衍时谨慎无比，积累了数代的优秀血统，就是要培养出一个能够为组织带来无上荣誉的战斗法师，同时，毁灭他们的死敌：教会骑士团。

组织在哈扎达尔荒漠的群山上设了一个隐秘的营地，其中抚养着一群和诺崇一样年轻的法师，组织里的导师们一直在等着诺崇展现自己独特的天赋。然而，就当其他学徒都开始施展并提升自己的火系、冰系、变形系魔法的时候，诺崇仍然是沉默地坐在那里，其貌不扬，连变形术都不会。随着最终考核日的临近，他身上仍然一点魔力都没有。导师们厌恶地斥责了他，其他人则大声地嘲笑。“你根本不是法师。”组织的领袖大声地宣布。然而，诺崇并没有灰溜溜地走掉。他进入了比赛场，俯视着那些嘲笑他的年轻法师们，随后，他让这些人以及他们的导师们明白了一个重要的道理：魔法之极，唯寂方至。诺崇将那些所谓的天才法师们一个接一个地沉默，让他们不得不和他近身搏斗，直到最后，赛场中站着的只有他一人，正如预言所示，他是风蚀之寒的首席。
heroes.hype_loc: 沉默术士可以改变每次战斗的局势，有他在场，敌人无法自如地施放技能。他挥舞旋刃将敌人粉碎的同时还将夺取他们的智力，让他们永远难以翻身。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 可以沉默地图上所有敌人

abilities.name: silencer_curse_of_the_silent
abilities.desc_loc: Curses the target area, dealing damage and causing enemy heroes to take damage over time and slowing their movement speed. Silenced enemies take %penalty_multiplier%x slow and damage. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased. The duration is paused as long as the target is silenced.
abilities.lore_loc: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.

abilities.name: silencer_glaives_of_wisdom
abilities.desc_loc: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, stealing his target's Intelligence with each hit and dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.
abilities.lore_loc: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases Stolen Intelligence per hit and steal duration.

abilities.name: silencer_last_word
abilities.desc_loc: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.
abilities.lore_loc: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
notes_loc: Channeling abilities will trigger this effect once the caster finishes its channel.

abilities.name: silencer_brain_drain
abilities.desc_loc: If Silencer kills an enemy hero, he permanently steals Intelligence.
notes_loc: To permanently steal Intelligence, Silencer doesn't need to land the killing blow, as long as the enemy hero is killed within %permanent_int_steal_range% range of Silencer or was debuffed by Silencer at the time of death.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases the Intelligence stolen per kill.

abilities.name: silencer_global_silence
abilities.desc_loc: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.
abilities.lore_loc: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
notes_loc: This skill works on invisible and Debuff Immune units, but gaining debuff immunity will remove its effect.
abilities.scepter_loc: Global Silence applies Arcane Curse to heroes for the duration of Global Silence.
facets_loc: 全领域静默在一个单位身上第一次结束后还会再次施加。

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_silencer_glaives_bounces
talents.desc_loc: Glaives of Wisdom Bounce to targets withing a {s:bonus_bounce_range} range.

facets.description_loc: 全领域静默在一个单位身上第一次结束后还会再次施加。
facets.name: silencer_reverberating_silence

new_abilities.name: silencer_brain_drain
new_abilities.desc_loc: 如果沉默术士击杀了敌方英雄，他将永久窃取智力。
notes_loc: 沉默术士无需完成击杀就能永久智力，只要敌方英雄在沉默术士附近%permanent_int_steal_range%范围内阵亡或者死亡时带有沉默术士的负面效果即可。
new_abilities.shard_loc: 提升每次击杀窃取的智力值。
